This test checks that hovering over a range reveals the expression type.

-- a.go --
package a

import "time"

func _() {
    _ = time.Now().UTC().Add(10 * time.Minute)//@hover("time.Now().UTC()", _, utc)

    root := node{}
    _ = root.child(3).name//@hover("root.child(3)", _, child)
}

-- lib.go --
package a

type node struct {
    name string
    children []*node
}

func (n *node) child(i int) *node {
    return n.children[i]
}

-- @utc --
-- @child --
